meanings.sent1: She carefully upfolded the letter before putting it in the envelope.
meanings.sent2: He always upfolds the map neatly after using it.
meanings.sent3: The magician upfolded the scarf, revealing a hidden dove.
meanings.sent4: The flower petals upfolded gracefully as the sun rose.
meanings.sent5: The baker upfolded the dough, creating beautiful layers in the pastry.

meanings.definition: A fold that is turned upward.
meanings.sent1: The upfold in the fabric added an interesting texture to the dress.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a small upfold in the corner of the map.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cozy spot in the upfold of the blanket.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range had a prominent upfold that could be seen from afar.
meanings.sent5: The upfold in the paper created a unique pattern when unfolded.
